label: Excerpt from the Calendar, Jesus before Pilate, excerpt from Suffrages. Three leaves from a manuscript Book of Hours
artist: Master of Guillaume Lambert (and his workshop for the borders)
description: Three manuscript leaves from the Drulhon-Fayete Hours, undetermined use, same as MS 105

label: Excerpts from the Hours of the Virgin. Two leaves from a manuscript Book of Hours
artist: Decoration in the style of Jean Colombe or Guillaume Lambert
description: Two manuscript leaves from a Book of Hours for the use of Rome

label: Adoration of the Magi. Leaf from a manuscript Book of Hours
artist: Master of the Calendar of the Hours of Aurillac, ms. 2
description: Manuscript leaf from a Book of Hours for the use of Bayeux, the same as MS 96 and MBAM 1962.1954

label: Seven miniatures from a breviary
artist: Master of the Echevinage of Rouen
description: Seven miniatures taken from a manuscript breviary for the use of Rouen (?) or of Rome (?)

label: Litanies (excerpts). Bifolio from a manuscript Book of Hours.
description: Bifolio of a manuscript Book of Hours for the use of Mons

label: Excerpts from the Suffrages. Two leaves from a manuscript Book of Hours
artist: Master of Guillaume Lambert (and his workshop for the borders)
description: Two manuscript leaves from the Drulhon-Fayete Hours, same as MS 103

label: The Visitation and the Presentation to the Temple. Two leaves from a manuscript Book of Hours
artist: Master of the Calendar of the Hours of Aurillac, ms. 2
description: 2 Manuscript leaves from a Book fo Hours for the use of Bayeux, the same as MS 95 and MBAM 1962.1954

label: Horae for the use of Sarum
artist: Artist of the large illuminations of MS 1097/9 in the National Library of Australia, Canberra
description: Manuscript Book of Hours for the use of Sarum. 4 large and 15 small miniatures, 104 leaves

label: Excerpts from the Office of Mary-Magdalen and Obsecro te. Two leaves from a manuscript Book of Hours
artist: Decoration in the style of the Circle of Maitre Francois
description: 2 leaves from a manuscript Book of Hours, same as MS 107
